description: General enquiry with high value indicators - triggers Route D with optional WhatsApp

parameters.summary: Called to ask about the company's experience with listed buildings. Has a Grade II listed property and wants to know if Hampstead Renovations handles conservation work.
parameters.additional_notes: Grade II listed property. Mentioned previous bad experience with another builder.

call.transcript:
Sarah: Good afternoon, Hampstead Renovations. Sarah speaking, how may I help you?

Caller: Hello, I'm calling to make an enquiry. I have a listed building and I wanted to know if you have experience with that sort of work?

Sarah: We certainly do work with period and listed properties. May I take your name?

Caller: Margaret Wilson.

Sarah: Thank you, Mrs Wilson. And whereabouts is the property?

Caller: It's in Hampstead Garden Suburb, NW11. It's Grade II listed.

Sarah: Lovely area. Ross has experience with conservation work and would be the best person to discuss the specifics. What's the best number to reach you on?

Caller: 07888 999000.

Sarah: That's oh-seven-eight-eight-eight, nine-nine-nine, oh-oh-oh. Thank you, Mrs Wilson. I've passed your details to Ross. He'll give you a call back to discuss your property and answer any questions about working with listed buildings.

Caller: Thank you, that's very helpful.

Sarah: Thank you for calling Hampstead Renovations. Goodbye.
